text: Slight flooding will occur in Inner Harbour area from 8 ~ 11 pm due to astronomical tide. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Haze during the day. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Slight flooding will occur in Inner Harbour area from 8 ~ 11 pm due to astronomical tide. Mainly fine. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly fine. Force 3 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Dry. Fine. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Force 2 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
